title: Episode 86 (video): Educational Games
description: Can games really be educational?  They certainly addictive and engaging.  Can we harness this aspect of games and use it to learn?  In this video I show you why I believe the answer is yes.  Let's talk about what really good teaching is and what really good games are like.  Then I take you on a brief tour of what I believe are some of the best examples of great educational games.  This time on The Psych Files.
